member.summary: Wrapper object for return value of Geolocation service.

member.summary: Represents the position, if any.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationResult.Error
member.summary: Represents the reason of an error occurring, if any.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationResult.IsSuccess
member.summary: Returns true if there is no error object, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationResult.TimeStamp
member.summary: Event time

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates
member.summary: The GeolocationCoordinates interface represents the position and altitude of the device on Earth, as well as the accuracy with which these properties are calculated. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/GeolocationCoordinates

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.Latitude
member.summary: Representing the latitude of the position in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.Longitude
member.summary: Represents the longitude of a geographical position, specified in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.Accuracy
member.summary: representing the accuracy, with a 95% confidence level, of the and properties expressed in meters.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.Altitude
member.summary: Representing the altitude of the position in meters above the WGS84 ellipsoid (which defines the nominal sea level surface). This value is null if the implementation cannot provide this data.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.AltitudeAccuracy
member.summary: Representing the accuracy, with a 95% confidence level, of the expressed in meters. This value is null if the implementation doesn't support measuring altitude.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.Speed
member.summary: Representing the velocity of the device in meters per second. This value can be null.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationCoordinates.Heading
member.summary: representing the direction in which the device is traveling. This value, specified in degrees, indicates how far off from heading due north the device is. Zero degrees represents true north, and the direction is determined clockwise (which means that east is 90 degrees and west is 270 degrees). If GeolocationCoordinates.speed is 0, heading is NaN. If the device is not able to provide heading information, this value is null.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationError
member.summary: The GeolocationPositionError interface represents the reason of an error occurring when using the geolocating device. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/GeolocationPositionError

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationError.ErrorCode
member.summary: Represents the reason of an error occurring.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationError.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Returns a human-readable DOMString describing the details of the error.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationPositionErrorCodes
member.summary: Represents the reason of an error occurring when using the geolocating device.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationPositionErrorCodes.PERMISSION_DENIED
member.summary: The acquisition of the geolocation information failed because the page didn't have the permission to do it.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationPositionErrorCodes.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE
member.summary: The acquisition of the geolocation failed because at least one internal source of position returned an internal error.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationPositionErrorCodes.TIMEOUT
member.summary: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation, defined by PositionOptions.timeout information was reached before the information was obtained.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Common.JsInterop.Geo.GeolocationEventInfo
member.summary: Geolocation event info to handle JS callback
